EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-04-03 Cloud Optimization.2. Last Chance.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance - Ready To Reduce Your Cloud Bill?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With public cloud adoption growing rapidly, it’s becoming clear that a plan to optimize your existing footprint is no longer a “nice-to-have,” it's a need to have. How can you go beyond surface-level optimization to unlock cost savings in the public cloud?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>
Join us tomorrow at 11 am ET for our webinar where Mor Cohen-Tal, Cloud CTO at Turbonomic, discusses the 5 steps to cloud optimization:
- Understanding your Applications - Understanding the Cloud Catalog - Defining Guardrails & Optimizing Low Hanging Fruit - and more!
As one of the very first Turbonomic employees, Mor started her career as a software engineer and has earned seven patents. She's helped hundreds of customers architect their public cloud strategy.
I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
